title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupts layout
description: Build 2002071610021. Coolbar deleting items corrupts the layout.
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. However, the Launch item is moved to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
EB: After pressing the Delete button, the first item on the second row should be deleted and the Launch item should remain on the second row.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Coolbar.
2. Press the Delete button.
3. Notice that the first item on the second row is deleted and the Launch item is moved to the first row instead of staying on the second row.
